description: Covering a range from 29mm-216mm in 35mm format, Canon's new EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS offers a winning combination of size, range and features and is a perfect complement to APS-C cameras. With high-quality optics, dedicated image stabilization and more, this new lens promises to be a favorite for EOS users.MTF chartsLens SpecificationsFocal Length & Maximum Aperture: 18 - 135mm 1:3.5-5.6Lens Construction: 16 elements in 12 groupsUD Glass: 1Diagonal Angle of View: 74 degrees 20' to 11 degrees 30'Focus System: Inner focusing systemClosest Focusing Distance: 1.5 ft. / 0.45mFilter Size: 67mmMax. Diameter x Length: 3.0 x 4.0 in./75.4 x 101mmWeight (lens only): 16.0 oz./455gComes with Rear and Lens Caps1 yr limited warranty
title: Canon EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS  Standard Zoom Lens for Canon Digital SLR Cameras
